as [93mtissue[0m [93moxygen[0m [93mstatus[0m, and [93mmorphogen[0m [93msignaling[0m. [93mIntegration[0m of these [93mcues[0m with [93mISC[0m [93mmetabolism[0m and [93mfate[0m - [93mNovel[0m [93mSm[0m-[93mdoped[0m [93mFeTiO[0m([93m3[0m)/[93mWO[0m([93m3[0m) [93mZ[0m-[93mscheme[0m [93mheterojunction[0m for [93mefficient[0m [93mphoto[0m-[93mFenton[0m [93mdegradation[0m of [93mtetracycline[0m [93mhydrochloride[0m.: As an [93miron[0m-[93mbased[0m [93mphotocatalytic[0m [93mmaterial[0m, [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m [93mhas[0m [93mbecome[0m an [93mimportant[0m [93msemiconductor[0m [93mmaterial[0m [93mdue[0m to its [93mexcellent[0m [93mstability[0m and [93mvisible[0m [93mlight[0m [93mabsorption[0m [93mcapabilities[0m. [93mHowever[0m, the [93mcatalytic[0m [93mactivity[0m of [93mpure[0m [93mFeTiO[0m [93m3[0m is [93mnotably[0m [93mhindered[0m by the [93mfast[0m [93mrecombination[0m of [93mphotogenerated[0m [93mcharges[0m and its [93minsufficient[0m [93moxidation[0m [93mstrength[0m.
